title: Network Design
description: Designing a multi-site healthcare network across Dublin, Limerick, and Sligo. Key focus on Layer 2 Security: DHCP Snooping, Dynamic ARP Inspection, Port Security. Redundant Floating Static Routes for failover, and secure Wireless LAN implementation

title: Assembly-Based Retro Game Development
description: Developing a simple game using Assembly language to deepen understanding of CPU architecture, memory management, and low-level system operations.

title: Cross-Platform Systems Integration
description: Developing a simple game using Assembly language to deepen understanding of CPU architecture, memory management, and low-level system operations.

title: Mobile Privacy: Device De-googling
description: Researching and implementing e/os to eliminate third-party tracking and enhance device security

title: Yunohost
description: Deploying a YunoHost instance on a Raspberry Pi 400 to self-host essential services suhc as NextCloud
